name: Alien Food Frenzy
description: Protect yourself and the world against fierce food animated by aliens to enslave human kind. Built exclusively for room-scale VR with the HTC Vive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @2.7GHz 2.71GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio Additional Notes: HTC Vive Room-Scale VR required to play
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @2.7GHz 2.71GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio Additional Notes: HTC Vive Room-Scale VR required to play
